app.name: Robo
app.og_title: Robo — Phone Sensors as APIs for AI Agents
app.og_description: Open-source iOS app that turns your phone's sensors into APIs any AI agent can use. LiDAR, camera, barcodes — no iOS development required.

hero.headline:
Your phone's sensors,
any AI agent.
hero.subheadline: Open-source iOS app that turns LiDAR, camera, and barcodes into APIs. No Swift required.

footer.tagline: Open source. Privacy-first. Built entirely with Claude Code.
